replies.body: You're welcome. And thank *you*.

Does anyone know if playing a "vs bots" game counts for this?

I only recently reached lvl30 and havent played a normals yet.
(i will do one right now for the skin, even if i get rekt.)

{{champion:10}} is one of my favorite 450-IP champs so the skin will be a perfect gift. Thank you Rito!
Yes :)

Are these just gifts, or is there a chance that we will receive these in Shard form? I play a ton of ARAM, and I don't want Kayle. Im sure there are plenty of people who appreciate the gift, but do not want the champion. I actively do not enjoy playing her, and play a game mode where I may have to. 

Like Gift everyone a chest with the champion shard, skin shard, and dust to craft them. Getting shards for the skin as a gift also makes less work for Riot. I'm sure there will be plenty of people opening support tickets to have it removed from their account. If we gets shards, we just dont have to use them, leaving support to get to more important tickets faster.

Wow, you are definitely one of the most entitled people i've seen in some time, congratulations mate. Hopefully they don't let you swap out the skin or anything so you can learn to appreciate the free things they didn't have to give you in the first place.

I disagree with the ARAM collection playstyle, but it is a valid point. People who avoid playing her on ARAM should have some option, as nobody else is being forced on anyone. It's only fair, to me.

Additionally, I think it shows a little ingenuity to implement other game systems into your gift, such as giving the champ shard, skin shard, and essences. Even if it were left to only essences, at least that is more customized than a flat gift that will backfire for a select few in the community.

Back in the days of the free Corki or ranked rewards, this wasn't so much an issue because ARAM wasn't there, and when it was, you had to excel at ranked, so fewer ARAM players were effected. This will be a sweeping effect through all of ARAM, on the other hand, and one that some players build entire accounts around. In fact, the only way around this for those players would be reactivating an inactive account and smurfing. I dislike the idea of incentivizing such activities, even if helpful only to a select few in the community.
Disliking a champion being gifted because of ARAM is the dumbest reason ever.
what the heck...who gets all the way to lvl 30 without even playing even one real match?
I agree with this, it took me forever to move over from bots to pvp simply because i didnt want to be a burden and fuck up peoples games

I just want to say, and I like never post but this caught my eye. **Get out of bots and into pub games.** 

I appreciate the empathy part, but playing games with people is **completely** different. You can learn about champs in bots, but _**you really learn nothing**_ about how people actually play. People act completely different than bots. Not to mention they ward intelligently, they play on your greed (bait), and many other things. 

You will handicap others in games, but you will grow and the lvl of satisfaction far outweighs that of bots. Also if someone is mean the mute button is OP. Report if its bad. There are bad people out there but screwing up is how you get better. GLHF in your pub games!
I lost to bot twice when I'm started, I was like: "Who tf is Baron?"
Riot, thanks for being there for me. I appreciate you making sure I avoided any forms of drugs, STDs, and alcohol because I spent all my time and money on this instead.
agreed it kept me away from any form of smoking, like cigars....{{champion:104}}

Right.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Well, it DID get me into vaping however {{champion:104}}

Is there a way how I can get Kayle removed from 
my account after this? She's the one champion I haven't bought and she tilts me so hard that I don't want her on my account. ;_;
You're a special kind of ungrateful :/

I don't want to get Kayle, either. Like, I appreciate the thought that was put into it, and I think it's great that they're doing something like this for their tenth year anniversary, but I simply do not like Kayle.
no one is making you play her :/
Unless you play aram
You should always have at least 1 reroll. If you don't you reroll too much and need to get better with more champions.
logged in just to upvote and thank you XD

Hey you want to know something good you guys can do?
give graves his cigar!{{item:3070}} {{champion:104}} {{item:3070}}
seriously, how come graggas can have his alcohol, and teemo his shrooms (cus those are obviously drugs man for real.)
{{champion:17}} is just the dealer, {{champion:240}} is the addict
Kled doesn't have a problem with mushrooms, he has a problem when he DOESN'T drink mushroom juice.
Graves vapes now. It's canon.

> The gratitude that we have... there is just no amount of words that can express it.
Lets try anyway with "Thank You" because I can't wait to loading into game with my 10 year icon when the 20 year one is released. {{summoner:14}} Love this game

_Comment is below threshold (Show)
_
























GOTCHA
fk

When we started this journey 10 years ago, we had no idea what Riot and League would become. Luckily, we were carried forward by the passion of a player community that continues to grow and evolve, ten years later. 

And another 10 years it will be!! Cheers and thanks! But might I suggest adding 10 days of U.R.F?! Since it hasn't been on the rotating game mode anymore!
10 Days of URF would be perfect pls riot

{{champion:238}} is free
Gives {{champion:10}} for free
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

Jokes aside, thanks for developing such a great game!
(*Hush my dream is to be a Rioter*)
how is zed free?
nope,  you have victorious skins and championship skins mixed up
Can people who already own riot kayle get a border to show that we are special snowflakes?

Please? ;-; I got it in hextech a while ago and I just got my lvl 7 mastery with Kayle with the skin too. Great, the one time I actually have the gift that would be sooo cool . . . . Maybe a random Riot skin? Riot plz? ^m^
Ooops, just realized if we have both we get a mystery skin, eh, good enough :P Still would love riot singed to go along with my Nasus and Kayle ones
I don't even know how I got mine
Even tho sometimes you make some odd choices with balance, still love this game with all my heart and will continue to play it

I'm not a long time player like a lot of people, I started around the release of Vel'Koz, but regardless of all the yelling that "This champ is to OP, Riot nerf this bull," I want to say, thank you, because of what you achieved, you have built a community full of so many great people, you have brought people together, and most of all, you have filled our empty free time.

But thank you, for all the fun, the laughs, the ability to build champions strange ways. Keep on working, and here's to another 10 years.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
